author: zach-folwick
body: This cuts off the wmi directory, which is not needed to get powershell working.  It also tightens up the dependencies by keeping them in a single location.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
I think it make sense to do it at the same time as getting rid of psl-monad submodule.
If you do it now and we keep psl-monad for monad and files changed in source-depot, it will become a PITA to merge them. Can we hold on it?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We cannot do this until we're clear to merge all SD sources to the superproject.

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: ah- my mistake.  I thought we were g2g on this.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yeah, it's not our call. This is what the PowerShell team(s) must do.

title: removed the wmi tree from monad.  Brought over to MMI directory
